alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Sanilac; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Sanilac, northeastern Lapeer and St. Clair Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from North Branch to Lum to near Almont. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Capac around 805 PM EDT. Marlette and Brown City around 810 PM EDT. Emmett around 815 PM EDT. Yale and Melvin around 820 PM EDT. Peck around 830 PM EDT. Sandusky around 835 PM EDT. Port Huron, Croswell, Lexington, Lakeport, Carsonville and Applegate around 845 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include North Street, Goodland Township, Lynn Township, Amador, Brockway, Juhl, Fort Gratiot, Avoca, Burnside and Fargo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
